entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 27. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 14.
